Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-10543 affecting package influxdb for versions less than 2.6.1-27
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-10543 affecting package influxdb for versions less than 2.6.1-27. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package influxdb is earlier than 2.6.1-27, affected by CVE-2025-10543
